sqlMap.select: select t.ID, t.RANK,t.SYS_ITEM_ID,t.PAY_TYPE,t.COST,t.UNIT,t.UNIT_TYPE,t.IS_DELETE,t.IS_ENABLE from SYS_TEAM_BUFF t where t.IS_DELETE = 0
select t.ID, t.RANK,t.SYS_ITEM_ID,t.PAY_TYPE,t.COST,t.UNIT,t.UNIT_TYPE,t.IS_DELETE,t.IS_ENABLE from SYS_TEAM_BUFF t where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into SYS_TEAM_BUFF( t.RANK,t.SYS_ITEM_ID,t.PAY_TYPE,t.COST,t.UNIT,t.UNIT_TYPE,t.IS_DELETE,t.IS_ENABLE) values( #rank#, #sysItemId#, #payType#, #cost#, #unit# #unitType# #isDelete# #isEnable# );
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
sqlMap.update: update SYS_TEAM_BUFF t set t.RANK=#rank#, t.SYS_ITEM_ID=#sysItemId#, t.PAY_TYPE=#payType# t.COST=#cost# t.UNIT=#unit# t.UNIT_TYPE=#unitType# t.IS_DELETE=#isDelete# t.IS_ENABLE=#isEnable# where t.ID = #id#
